dress.title: Belted Interlock Dress
dress.body:
A midi dress made from a cotton-blend knit. Features a round neck, short sleeves, and a self-tie belt.

### Composition
80% cotton, 20% polyester

### Care
Machine wash at 30ºC, delicate spin. Do not bleach. Iron at max 110ºC.

### Origin
Made in Bangladesh.
